node.detail_zh: 患者是第 #1292 宗個案患者的兒子，過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，沒有上學。在父親於 7 月 7 日確診後被送往檢疫中心，7 月 9 日開始發燒，由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient is the son of patient #1292. He has good past health and no recent travel history. He has not been to school. After his father was diagnosed on July 7, he was sent to the quarantine centre. The patient started having fever on July 9 and was sent to hospital from the quarantine centre.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Tak Wo House, Wo Che Estate
